form.PN:
pridevnik in samostalnik izgovarjamo
/pr*ez@nt/
, glagol pa
/pri1z*ent/
.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
present
opisujemo osebe in stvari, ki obstajajo zdaj, v nasprotju s tistimi, ki so obstajale v preteklosti ali bodo obstajale v prihodnosti.

seg.quote: The present chairperson is a woman.
Economic planning cannot succeed in present conditions.

sense.def:
The present
je obdobje, ki poteka zdaj, in stvari, ki se dogajajo zdaj.

seg.quote: We have to come to terms with the present.

sense.def:
Kdor je
present at an event
, se udeleži neke prireditve.

seg.quote: He had been present at the dance.
There was a photographer present.

sense.def:
A present
je nekaj, kar damo komu, na primer za rojstni dan ali božič.

seg.quote: I gave him an atlas as a birthday present.

sense.def:
To present oneself somewhere
pomeni nekje naznaniti, da smo prišli;

seg.quote: The next morning I presented myself at their offices.

sense.def:
To present someone to an important person
pomeni nekoga uradno seznaniti z neko pomembno osebo;

seg.quote: May I present Mr Rudolph Wallace.

sense.def:
To present someone with something
pomeni nekomu nekaj uradno dati.

seg.quote: He presented her with a signed copy of his book.
One of his constituents presented a petition to Parliament.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
presents a difficulty or a challenge
, predstavlja težavo ali izziv.

seg.quote: The tornado presented the island with severe problems.

sense.def:
To present information
pomeni posredovati podatke ljudem.

seg.quote: ...a way of presenting new material.
Our teachers were trying to present us with an accurate picture of history.

sense.def:
To present someone or something in a particular way
pomeni opisati osebo ali stvar na določen način.

seg.quote: Her lawyer wanted to present her in the most favourable light.
They present the British as the colonialist oppressor.

sense.def:
To present a programme on television or radio
pomeni v televizijski ali radijski oddaji predstaviti posamezne dele ali nastopajoče.

seg.quote: ...’University Link’, compiled and presented by Dr Brian Smith.
Her strong point is that she's a very good presenter.

sense.def:
Kadar se nekaj dogaja
at present
, se dogaja zdaj.

seg.quote: He is at present serving a life sentence.

sense.def:
Kadar neke okoliščine obstajajo
for the present
, obstajajo zdaj, vendar je verjetno, da se bodo spremenile.

seg.quote: For the present she continues with the antibiotics.

sense.def:
The present day
je obdobje, ki poteka zdaj.

seg.quote: This tradition has continued till the present day.
